rules_text:
Whenever Precursor Omniprocessor attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Precursor Omniprocessor and it gains menace until end of turn.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]When they made it, it ate the mold.[/i]
